Comment: If you aren't following the Hegseth incompetence drama too closely, this is his chief of staff Joe Kasper.  His reassignment was known 5 days ago, but shifted from "that's fake news" to "we meant to do that" two days ago.  The other leaders and senior staff who have been purged, fired, or quit, that's a whole mess.   Wait for Maggie Haberman to bring us all up to speed in the Sunday Times.

Comment: My state subreddit used to be so full of posts by people proud of trump and thrilled that he won and blah blah blah. Literally nothing for over a month now. Zip. Zilch. Nada. And for those of us who are still posting, they will no longer answer or respond to anything we say. This is the biggest sign I know that tells me that there's a lot of embarrassed people out there right now. We used to have a group of regular trumpers that constantly argued with us about everything. They have literally disappeared.
Author: Ande64

Comment: My reading is that Kasper won the backstabbing competition last week that led to the jettisoning of several senior leaders under accusations of being "leakers".   But that victory was short-lived.  Kasper was formerly chief of staff for Rep. Duncan Hunter, whom you might remember from "vaping Congressman" memes, indictment on campaign finance embezzlement, blaming his wife and his mistresses, and a Presidential pardon.  My money is on Duncan Hunter being the next SecDef, and Kasper's triumphant return to the Pentagon.
Author: Aghast_Cornichon

Comment: Tell me about it, I’m in Florida! Normally you see all the trump flags on people’s boats. I guess they flew off during the ride over to the sandbar! Two of the guys I hang around with are in the roofing business. They have definitely changed their tune. I know that one lost 5 of his crews. He hates the people who come across the border but has zero issues having them work 1099 for him? Stupid is as stupid does!
